text: Simon Renucci Simon Renucci (born March 29, 1945) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Corse-du-Sud department from 2002 to 2012 as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Corse-du-Sud Category:Corsican politicians Category:Members of the Corsican Assembly Category:Mayors of Ajaccio Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Simon Renucci
